thread.title: Kids get early start on Halloween fun at Trick or Treat on the Farm
thread.title_full: Kids get early start on Halloween fun at Trick or Treat on the Farm

title: Kids get early start on Halloween fun at Trick or Treat on the Farm
text:
Kids get early start on Halloween fun at Trick or Treat on the Farm Published 5:28 PM CDT Oct 17, 2015 
Some kids were able to get into the Halloween spirit early at Gifford Farms. Related 
The farm hosted its annual Trick or Treat on the Farm Saturday morning. 
Kids were able to see and pet animals, go on hay rides and get some tasty treats. 
"It's exciting to see them come in costume and how cute they are and how excited they are," farm director Nancy Williams said. 
This is the 12th year for the event and kids of all ages are welcome to participate. Recommended Comments The views expressed are not those of this site, this station or its affiliated companies.
